desc: Specific topics announced prior to each term are based on student interests and available staff. Class work includes comprehensive review of literature on the specific topic. Class meetings present topics in discussion format. May be repeated if topic is different. Counts toward environmental studies major (all emphases) and concentration when taught with environmental science focus and approved by chair. Prerequisites: vary.
name: Top: TBA
notes: Not open to first-year students. This course has field trips. Only open to Seniors and Juniors.

revisions.notes: Not open to first-year students. This course has field trips.

title: Selected Topics
